text: Anthony Turgis (born 16 May 1994) is a French professional racing cyclist, who currently rides for UCI ProTeam . He was named in the startlist for the 2017 Vuelta a España. In July 2018, he was named in the start list for the Tour de France. ==Major results== ;2012 : 1st Stage 2a (TTT) Liège–La Gleize : UEC European Junior Road Championships ::2nd 15px Road race ::10th Time trial : 2nd Paris–Roubaix Juniors ;2014 : 1st Liège–Bastogne–Liège Espoirs : 3rd 15px Road race, UEC European Under-23 Road Championships ;2015 : 1st 20px Overall Boucles de la Mayenne ::1st 20px Young rider classification ::1st Stage 2 : 3rd 15px Road race, UCI Road World Under-23 Championships : 8th Overall Arctic Race of Norway : 9th Road race, European Games ;2016 : 1st Classic Loire Atlantique : 3rd Overall Tour de Yorkshire : 4th Overall Tour de Luxembourg ::1st Stage 3 : 5th Grand Prix de Plumelec-Morbihan ;2017 : 3rd Paris–Chauny : 3rd Tour de l'Eurométropole ;2018 : 2nd Road race, National Road Championships : 5th Dwars door West–Vlaanderen : 5th Paris–Chauny ;2019 : 1st Grand Prix d'Ouverture La Marseillaise : 1st Paris–Chauny : 2nd Dwars door Vlaanderen : 4th Overall Four Days of Dunkirk ::1st 20px Young rider classification : 4th Overall Tour de Luxembourg ::1st 20px Young rider classification : 4th Famenne Ardenne Classic : 5th Circuit de Wallonie : 5th Paris–Bourges ;2020 : 4th Tour of Flanders : 5th Road race, National Road Championships : 8th Brabantse Pijl ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- !
